thread.title: 19 Not-So-Shitty Items For Anyone Who Loves The Poop Emoji
thread.title_full: 19 Not-So-Shitty Items For Anyone Who Loves The Poop Emoji

author: Samantha Wieder
title: 19 Not-So-Shitty Items For Anyone Who Loves The Poop Emoji
text:
We hope you love the products we recommend! Just so you know, BuzzFeed may collect a share of sales from the links on this page. ID: 10748127 1. Have a not-so-crappy start to your day with this coffee mug that tells the truth, the whole truth, and nothing but the truth. View this image › 
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $14.99 .
ID: 10748645 2. Or take your caffeine to go with this sassy tumbler . View this image › 
theankit.com Get it from Ankit for $14.99 .
ID: 10750983 3. This poop-emoji cookie stamp will take your next batch of cookies to a whole new level. View this image › 
sheyb.com Get it from SheyB Cookie Designs for $12 .
ID: 10748986 4. Trust me, the ONLY poop you’ll want to find in your pool is this float . View this image › 
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $33.95 .
ID: 10749244 5. Everyone poops so why not wear it loud and proud in the form of this cute and cozy sweater ? View this image › 
moooh.net Get it from Moooh! for $26.99 .
ID: 10749273 6. This poop-emoji plunger will make unclogging your toilet a less shitty task. View this image › 
plungerproject.com Get it from the Plunger Project for $20 . Best of all, they donate 10% of the proceeds to sanitation and clean water charities.
ID: 10749376 7. These slippers are the only kind of crap you’ll want to be stepping in. View this image › 
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $11.99 .
ID: 10749485 8. Friendship charm necklaces for you and the BFF who deals with your shit. View this image › 
etsy.com Get it from Clay Creations ForEver on Etsy for $21.10 .
ID: 10749547 9. You know you can’t resist buying this happens sweater for your favorite furry friend. View this image › 
etsy.com Get it from Dapper As Fluff on Etsy for $39.50 .
ID: 10749842 10. This hilarious portable phone charger will ensure you never end up with a dead phone again. View this image › 
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $15.99 .
ID: 10749910 11. Kiddos will get a kick out of these poop-emoji pencil toppers . Perfect as party favors, gag gifts, or just to make any pencil a No. 2 pencil. View this image › 
etsy.com Get it from Exclusively Yours Embroidery on Etsy for just $1 .
ID: 10749998 12. Will you become the most poopular party host with these balloons at your next special occasion? I think so. View this image › 
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $8.41 .
ID: 10750038 13. Warning: You may never want to leave home after putting on these onesies . paom.com , paom.com Get the colorful onesie and the poop faces onesie from Paom for $135 each.
ID: 10750235 14. This bath mat is the best way to keep the floors around your shower or tub dry while showing all your house guests what your true title is. View this image › 
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $11.68 .
ID: 10750496 15. Clip your school ID, work ID, or even your gym card onto this badge reel to make a statement. View this image › 
etsy.com Get it from Kingston Designs on Etsy for $6.50 .
ID: 10750683 16. Make this adorably trendy snapback your new go-to accessory. View this image › 
luckygamblershop.com Get it from Lucky Gambler Apparel for $19.77 .
ID: 10750746 17. Babies are lean, mean, pooping machines, so it only makes sense to have them rep the poopmoji with this onesie . View this image › 
etsy.com Get it from MZPSYCOTOONZ on Etsy for $8 .
ID: 10750806 18. This perfect plushy poopy pillow will definitely become your new fave cuddle buddy. View this image › 
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $9.99 .
ID: 10750881 19. Never again will you have to say “CRAP, what time is it?!” with this clock . View this image › 
etsy.com Get it from All Great Stuff on Etsy for $34.95 .
